Name: VirtualCast
About the game: VirtualCast is a metaverse communication service where you can share extraordinary experiences with your friends; anytime and anywhere. Enjoy unique events, VR games made by your friends, photos and videos of happy moments and your room full of fun stuff and memories. Start exploring the VR experience of a life lime!
